full_summary:
**[Notice of Call for Proposal]** {Note: In English only, for French see below}

The Canadian Federal elections authority, **Elections Canada**, invites proposals from qualified Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS) suppliers for a contract to provide Human Resource (HR) expertise.

**Contract Details:**

*            Contract Title/Reference Number: PW-23-01026982 (PW-23-01026982 S)
*            Solicitation number: ECGZ-RFP-2022-1730
*            Tender closing date and time: 2023-03-23T14:00:00

This contract will arise pursuant to a Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS) supply arrangement for the provision of human resource services in support of Elections Canada’s business requirements. The scope of this contract involves the provision of services related to organization and classification, staffing, and compensation.

**Proposal Requirements:**

*            This contract is open exclusively to holders of a TSPS supply arrangement under the contract Nomenclature E60ZT-18TSPS.
*            The **Notice of Proposal** must be directed to the contracting authority at proposal-proposal@elections.ca.
*            All proposals must be submitted by [Bid Closing Date].
*            Proposals must be addressed to the contracting authority and delivered to the proposal receiving unit on or before the tender closing date and time.
*            The Proposer must complete and submit a  TSPS Proposal Form with each proposal.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
*            Proposals will be evaluated based on human resource expertise and the economy factors as set out in TSPS award criteria applicable to this solicitation.
*            Suppliers are encouraged to provide a complete and accurate proposal.

**Assurance and Security Clearance**
The supplier must have a security clearance, at a minimum, of VOD (Confidence Reliability) in order to perform the services required in this contract.

**Additional Information:**

*            Suppliers who have registered to bid through **Bbid** may register and access the Request for Proposal and other solicitation documents.

Please refer to the attached documents for a full description of the requirement, the procurement methodology, and the tender process.
